title: corporate mundo disabled?
body: i just used all of my RP to buy the corporate mundo skin and when i try to use it it says that the skin has been disabled can someone explain to me why it is disabled and if they plan to fix it or did i just wast all of my RP

replies.body:
Hiya! 

That's correct - he's currently disabled due to a bug. We're working on a fix, and he'll certainly be available again. 

Sorry for the inconvenience. D:

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=GU3BG3KA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-26T20:59:43.192+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> That's correct - he's currently disabled due to a bug. We're working on a fix, and he'll certainly be available again. 
> 
> Sorry for the inconvenience. D:

Ah so THATS why it wont work.

Thank you Kate!
Any info on what bug it was? It's my fav skin of his...
Any kind of estimate on how long until we get Corporate Mundo back?
We have a fix, so it shouldn't be much longer until he's available to play again.
Patch 5.13: Corporate Mundo is back in business.
Is that in the patch notes? I didnt see it.
Nope. Though he should be enabled after 5.13.

the skin has been disabled can someone explain to me why it is disabled and if they plan to fix it or did i just wast all of my RP
why ,,,,,,,i cant understand what happened about it
It was disabled since the briefcases were invisible to the enemy team.

No. They are going to keep it in the store but not working forever so that people waste their RP.

Come on, did you really have to ask that question?
{{champion:36}} Mundo currently busy at the office now. Please leave a message after the beep. *Slurps*
Still no fix in 5.13, that sucks.
i to buy mundo skin and trow 1800rp but hee disablet almost 2 weeks. Comon riot

Translation:

I _NEED_ to buy Corporate Mundo and _SPEND_ 1800 RP_,_ but _he is disabled for_ almost 2 weeks _now_. _Come on_ Riot.
Invisible suit cases...  GAME BREAKING,  eternally invisible spears...  Working as Intended....
can someone explain exactly whats wrong with the skin an what the bug is?
Again, the briefcases were invis, making them hard/impossible to dodge.
Yes, it needs some attention by next patch.
Does riot plan to apologize to those who bought/own the skin and are unable to use it? I understand that it is a bug, but it seems unfair to those who save the RP and are unable to use the skin.
You mean to say you want free stuff because they are fixing a bug? I'm sure you'll survive without using a skin for a day or two.

No, I don't really want free stuff, just the bug to be fixed soon since its been a week, and since Corporate Mundo isn't disabled in the store, people are wasting RP on a skin that they'd like to use, but have to wait for a bug fix.
i think people deserve a 1 day ip boost atleast since some people buy that skin after along time of wanting it.
come on guys get it working i main mundo and i hate being basic mundo, it is disheartening as only skin i have ever purchased is disabled...
riot its been awhile now, i would like my mundo skin. pls
You got your answer, now go play any of the other hundreds of champions on the rift for a few days..
I just bought it too.... Hey Riot can you give us a date when this skin bug will be fixed?
